data.title: Oeuvres choisies de Gavarni revues, corrigées et nouvellement classées par l'auteur--Etudes de moeurs contemporaines.
data.meta_description: (Paris: J. Hetzel [Hetzel, Warnod; Hetzel / Garnier frères], 1846[-1848]) Octavo, four vols.; (v. 1) [6 ff.] 39 plates, [2 ff.] 5 pls., [2 ff.] 25 pls., [2 ff.] 11 pls …

Publisher: Garnier frères (French, 19th–20th century)

Place of Publication: Paris, France

Medium/Technique Illustrated book with numerous wood engravings

Dimensions Overall (each vol.): 27 x 19.2 x 2.2 cm (10 5/8 x 7 9/16 x 7/8 in.)

Credit Line William A. Sargent Collection—Bequest of William A. Sargent

Accession Number37.2127a-b

NOT ON VIEW

ClassificationsIllustrated books

Paris: J. Hetzel [Hetzel, Warnod; Hetzel / Garnier frères], 1846[-1848]

Catalogue Raisonné Carteret III, 260-64; Brivois, pp. 168-71; Ray, French Illustrated Book, 207

Description(Paris: J. Hetzel [Hetzel, Warnod; Hetzel / Garnier frères], 1846[-1848]) Octavo, four vols.; (v. 1) [6 ff.] 39 plates, [2 ff.] 5 pls., [2 ff.] 25 pls., [2 ff.] 11 pls., [1 f.]; (v. 2) [4 ff.] 45 [of 48] pls., [2 ff.] 19 pls., [2 ff.] 13 pls., [2 ff.]; (v. 3) [4 ff.] , frontispiece, 23 pls., [2 ff.] 10 pls., [2 ff.] 47 pls., [1 f.]; (v. 4) [4 ff.] 30 pls., [2 ff.] 50 pls., [1 f.]; contemporary half gilt-stamped red morocco, red paper boards.

Humorous illustrations of various "types": actors, students, women, etc.

ProvenanceAcquired in 1933 from Lardanchet, Paris, by William A. Sargent, Boston (1858-1936), by whom bequeathed to MFA, November 17, 1937.
